name: Wild Cards Web
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 41. Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres (Survival + Card Game).

Its a survival game, but you must have the right card to survive. it's our first attempt in the making of a 3D game.

You can collect some  resources, tame animals, and upgrade your tools. don't forget to eat, and rest, to restock your deck.

FOR THE ORIGINAL EVENT VERSION CHECK:
https://adtberp.itch.io/wild-cards
